title: Still no icon sept/24
body: just wondering if riot forgot about my icon i still havent received it :(

replies.body: Same, i still haven't gotten my icon yet :( .

We have not forgotten and the gifts are still coming.  Stay up to date through our current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  There's a lot of accounts to gift, so it will take some more time.  It will come!
